channel.title: ..::[Most Of My Best Sigs]::
channel.description:
Well heres most of my best sigs, some made for other people, some for myself.. rate/hate/masturbate. :D
[img]http://img266.imageshack.us/img266/3439/1stnewsigjpeghf2.jpg[/img] [img]http://img266.imageshack.us/img266/3079/3nhalfhoursigjpegyu8.jpg[/img] [img]http://img266.imageshack.us/img266/8432/goomygift2jpegxi9.jpg[/img] [img]http://img266.imageshack.us/img266/9373/goomygiftjpegxa4.jpg[/img] [img]http://img167.imageshack.us/img167/2338/gorillaztutsigjpegkk4.jpg[/img] [img]http://img167.imageshack.us/img167/4163/hatchetvixennewjpegjn2.jpg[/img] [img]http://img167.imageshack.us/img167/2339/lightningmcqueenjpeggu5.jpg[/img] [img]http://img294.imageshack.us/img294/7100/kostentry1jpeg5ti.jpg[/img] [img]http://img140.imageshack.us/img140/4598/stevosigacesoflustjpegct2.jpg[/img] [img]http://img469.imageshack.us/img469/2818/owntsigjpegcb7.jpg[/img]
Might update some more soon :)
-Stevo.

item.title: ..::[Most Of My Best Sigs]::
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Hey guys, chill out. Someone has already reported a few posts. Any more name-calling or other flaming will get that “oh-no” green little cricle under their name. Please stop and be happy. Corny, but just stop.

~Ron

item.title: ..::[Most Of My Best Sigs]::
item.dc:creator: @fezz fezz
item.description:
@fezz wrote:

[quote=“StevoTheOnly, post:12, topic:120299”][quote author=exps35 link=topic=169785.msg1574069#msg1574069 date=1183763493]

And how do i get to be “Graphics Master”

Good job. Now I dislike you from the beginning.
Anybody who asks for a forum award on their 4th post is a little conceited, wouldn’t you say?

Anywho, they’re all pretty good.
[/quote]

How is that begging? its asking a question u fucking idiot.

Thanks for everyone else who has commented…[/quote]dont flame…

Read full topic

item.title: ..::[Most Of My Best Sigs]::
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

[quote=“Pookey71, post:7, topic:120299”][quote author=StevoTheOnly link=topic=169785.msg1573249#msg1573249 date=1183737027]


http://img167.imageshack.us/img167/2338/gorillaztutsigjpegkk4.jpg
[/quote]
Hmmm, wonder why it says TUT there? Oh well, I remember Fast BAWLZ making one of these.[/quote]

IDK Where the fuck you saw me make something like that…

And maybe it says TUT because maybe he made a tutorial for it?..

For once… These actually DONT look ripped ^.^

But the best have to be the Winnie the Poo

…O yea and by the way you could have added a layer mask to that gorillaz sig and erased everything that covered the render…
But only if you made the text more to the left.

Read full topic
